name: assistant-update
title: Update Assistant
description: Modify an existing AI assistant's configuration, instructions, tools, or metadata. Use this to refine assistant behavior, add new capabilities, update instructions based on feedback, or change the model. Perfect for iterative improvement and maintaining assistants over time.

assistant_id.description: The unique identifier of the assistant to update (format: "asst_abc123...").

model.description: The AI model to use for the assistant (e.g., "gpt-4", "gpt-3.5-turbo", "claude-3-sonnet"). Choose based on your provider's available models. Leave unchanged if not specified.

name.description: New name for the assistant. Leave unchanged if not specified.

description.description: New description of what the assistant does. Leave unchanged if not specified.

instructions.description: New system instructions that define the assistant's behavior. Leave unchanged if not specified.

tools.description: New array of tools to enable for the assistant. Replaces existing tools if specified.

metadata.description: New metadata key-value pairs. Replaces existing metadata if specified.

examples.title: Update assistant instructions
examples.description: Refine an assistant's behavior by updating its instructions

input.instructions: You are an expert code reviewer with a focus on security and performance. Always check for potential vulnerabilities and suggest optimizations.

examples.title: Add tools to assistant
examples.description: Enable additional tools for an existing assistant
